response.overview: In 2015, a series of murders shakes Belo Horizonte, each victim with a unique signature, made by the killer himself, a script. Entitled "Rat Scene".  Years after failing the case, detectives Mildred and Marius are pulled back into the investigation when one of their colleagues, Detective Phillip, disappears, and a script resurfaces in his house. The "Rat Scene", this time signed with the name "Mildred."  Bringing the "Rat" closer than ever. The return threatens dangerous revelations in a game they have never stopped playing.  Now they need to find out where Phillip is. How?  By making the "Rat Scene" with the "Rat" himself.
response.tagline: That's not it... I just wanted to say... I just wanted to say what I already told you: that you don't have to call me sir. You know... I believe I've even told you that all these things may be unnecessary between us.
response.title: Rat Scene
